movies.title: Space Wizards 2222
movies.actors: Edmund Dehn, Wayne Grace, Timothy Watson, Nick Jameson
movies.plot: The game is set before the Battle of Yavin, while the Empire is still constructing the Death Star. The campaign goes through the events before this, on both the Rebel and Imperial side.

movies.title: SPACE WIZARDS
movies.actors: David Anthony Pizzuto, David W. Collins, David Sobolov, Frank Klepacki
movies.plot: Tyber Zaan, a crime lord, is freed from prison and creates an empire of crime and destruction named after himself. He then begins his wuest for control of the galaxy, destroying Rebels and Imperial alike.
